EmailTemplate.name: 201812_BK_Email-Customers_Happy_Holidays_MC.201812_BK_Email_Happy_Holidays_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays from BendixKing!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
With the closing of 2018, we want to thank you for being a valued BendixKing customer, and look forward to providing you more services in 2019.
Earlier this year, we expanded our BendixKing Authorized Repair Partner <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Search/Dealer-Directory]]> network worldwide. These exceptional support partners offer the same quality of service and expertise that we maintain at our factory in Olathe. Please visit our website <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Search/Dealer-Directory]]> to find an authorized partner near you.
Our Wingman Services <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/Home.do]]> team sent a notice that there is a shortage of KMD database cards; please send the old cards back when renewing your subscription. For more information or to contact wingman services, email DSA@honeywell.com <[[mailto:DSA@honeywell.com]]>.
On behalf of the entire BendixKing organization, Wingman Services and your BendixKing Authorized Repair Partners, we wish you and your families a very safe and happiest of holidays.
